help.name: The module name defines the folder name and the import path.
help.description: A description of what the module does
help.title: A title to use
help.url: The URL to navigate to your module in the app
help.styles: The style sheets, by default, are handled with sass.
help.webcomponent: Is the name of the HTML tag which going to be used to include it. Must be in lowercase and with two words separated by '-'
